name: Bad Bots Rise
description: Bad Bots Rise is an action-packed platform-shooter. Dodge bullets, evade traps and destroy enemies in a 2D sidescroller environment. Explore different levels and choose the right character for the right scenario. Utilize keystones' passive abilities to enhance your playstyle.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual-Core, 2.8 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 920MX 2GB Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/10 Processor: Quad-Core, 2.8 GHz or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 950M 2GB Storage: 500 MB available space
